name: thermostatMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the thermostat's temperature control mode.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the thermostat's temperature control mode.

parameters.name: predefinedThermostatMode
parameters.description: The predefined thermostat mode to be set (e.g., automatic, outing, emergency heating, standard).

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to which the thermostat should be set.
